thread.title_full: Valentine Holmes reportedly offered enormous Sharks contract | League | Sporting News

author: Sporting News
title: Valentine Holmes reportedly offered enormous Sharks contract | League | Sporting News
text:
February 1, 2017 5:34pm EST February 1, 2017 5:22pm EST The Cronulla Sharks have reportedly offered one of the biggest contracts in their history to keep hold of star player Valentine Holmes. Sporting News 
Published on Feb. 1, 2017 
Feb. 1, 2017 
The Cronulla Sharks have reportedly offered one of the biggest contracts in their history to keep hold of star player Valentine Holmes. 
MORE:Ã‚ Toulon up ante as manager predicts Barba will play in Global Tens 
Reports are that a 'multi-million dollar' offer has been tabled to keep Holmes at the club until 2021. 
After a stellar couple of seasons for the Sharkies, the Australian international has attracted a lot of attention from other clubs but the 2016 Premiers appear to be doing everything in their power to keep hold of him. 
The 21-year old has made it clear he wants to make the fullback jersey his own and with the uncertainty around Ben Barba's future this could be his opportunity. 
Sharks CEO Lyall Gorman stated the contract talks had been 'positive' but added the 'discussions will continue.'
